com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root
Class InformerClassInvocationHandler<InformerType extends Informer<ContainedType>,ContainedType>

java.lang.Object
  com.dooapp.gaedo.utils.BasicInvocationHandler<InformerType,MethodResolver>
      com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root.InformerClassInvocationHandler<InformerType,ContainedType>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validable, Proxied, InvocationHandler
public class InformerClassInvocationHandler<InformerType extends Informer<ContainedType>,ContainedType>
extends BasicInvocationHandler<InformerType,MethodResolver>
implements InvocationHandler, Proxied, Validable

This invocation handler will transform calls to synthetic informers getters into calls to the realInformer's Informer.get(String) method.

Author:
Nicolas

This class used to eager load all methods, but this generates failures in case when a class refers to itself as member (see Tag test bean for an example of such a configuration).

invokeAPIMethod

protected Object invokeAPIMethod(Method method,
                                 Object[] invokedArgs)
                          throws Throwable
Invoked when user calls a methosd from the FieldInformerAPI interface on that proxy. It allows us to mimic some behaviours (typically the FieldInformerAPI.with(Collection) method will be abused)
